job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Junior Software Engineer (Front End)GavinHeath is partnering with a client who is looking to hire a Junior Software Engineer on a 100% remote basis. This is a direct hire position.This role could be a great fit for you if:You have developed React-based web applications used by multiple users in a production environment, or...You have developed web applications using another JavaScript framework used by multiple users in a production environment and have experience on a software development team, or...You can provide multiple examples of non-production web applications you have developed and have formal education in front-end development and have experience on a software development teamResponsibilitiesPlay a key role on a small, highly productive team of experienced developersDevelop high quality product features that get used, every dayProduce high quality code through thoughtful design, diligent execution and good test coverageProvide well-structured code for review by team members and engage in thoughtful and critical discussionsContribute ideas to the team and the company as a whole to improve how we workQualificationsFormal computer science or software engineering education or equivalent knowledge and skills gained through multi-year, professional experienceDemonstrable examples of modern web application components you have developedStrong software development fundamentals and problem-solving skillsAn understanding of user interface software designExperience using modern web application development tools and technologiesA passion for learning and educationA desire to go above and beyond to do what is right for our customersIntellectual curiosity and a willingness to learn and share with others you work withA high standard of excellence in the work you doGood communication skills and cognitive empathy
